Translations.Text: Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana mrta prthibi. Ami eke sanjibita kari ebam ta theke utpanna kari sasya, tara ta theke bhaksana kare.
Ami tate srsti kari khejura o angurera bagana ebam prabahita kari tate nirjharini.
Yate tara tara phala khaya. Tadera hata eke srsti kare na. Atahpara tara krtajnata prakasa kare na kena
pabitra tini yini yamina theke utpanna udbhidake, tadera'i manusake ebam ya tara jane na, tara pratyekake jora jora kare srsti karechena.
Tadera jan'ye eka nidarsana ratri, ami ta theke dinake apasarita kari, takhana'i tara andhakare theke yaya.
Surya tara nirdista abasthane abartana kare. Eta parakramasali, sarbajna, allahara niyantrana.
Candrera jan'ye ami bibhinna manayila nirdharita karechi. Abasese se puratana kharjura sakhara anurupa haye yaya.
Surya nagala pete pare na candrera ebam ratri agre cale na dinera pratyeke'i apana apana kaksapathe santarana kare.
Tadera jan'ye ekati nidarsana e'i ye, ami tadera santana-santatike bojha'i naukaya arohana kariyechi.
Ebam tadera jan'ye naukara anurupa yanabahana srsti karechi, yate tara arohana kare.
Ami iccha karale taderake nimajjata karate pari, takhana tadera jan'ye kona sahayyakari ne'i ebam tara paritrana'o pabe na.
Kintu amara'i paksa theke krpa ebam taderake kichu kala jibanopabhoga karara suyoga deyara karane ta kari na.
Ara yakhana taderake bala haya, tomara samanera ayaba o pechanera ayabake bhaya kara, yate tomadera prati anugraha kara haya, takhana tara ta agrahya kare.
Yakhana'i tadera palanakartara nirdesabalira madhye theke kona nirdesa tadera kache ase, takhana'i tara ta theke mukhe phiriye neya.

Yakhana taderake bala haya, allaha tomaderake ya diyechena, ta theke byaya kara. Takhana kapherara muminaganake bale, iccha karale'i allaha yake kha'oyate paratena, amara take kena kha'oyaba? Tomara to spasta bibhrantite patita rayecha.
Tara bale, tomara satyabadi hale bala e'i oyada kabe purna habe
tara kebala ekata bhayabaha sabdera apeksa karache, ya taderake aghata karabe tadera parasparika bakabitandakale.
Takhana tara ochiyata karate'o saksama habe na. Ebam tadera paribara-parijanera kache'o phire yete parabe na.
